name: Robo-Rescue
description:
Robo-Rescue is a logical puzzle game, where you have to control a support robot through five levels. 

You are trapped in a malfunctioning nuclear power plant, and your only chance for help is the little robot. 

Unfortunately its control circuit was damaged and you have to manually input orders into it. Find programs and build a line of command for the robot, so it can execute it and leave the room.
